ClassDef.Name: Game

Properties.Name: GameID
Properties.Description: The ID of the current Polytoria place.

Properties.Name: ServerID
Properties.Description: The server ID of the current instance.

Properties.Name: UpTime
Properties.Description: The uptime of this game in seconds.

Properties.Name: InstanceCount
Properties.Description: The total number of instances currently loaded.

Events.Name: Ready
Events.Description: Fires when the game is ready

Events.Name: Rendered
Events.Description: Fires every frame after the place has been rendered. The `delta` parameter is the time between the last frame and the current.

ClassDef.Description: Game is the root object in the Polytoria instance tree. It is the object from which everything is descended.
